amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 116-289 to require the GAO to submit to Congress within one year of the bills enactment a report on the effect that closure of the U.S. Export Finance Agency would have on businesses that utilize the Agencys services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 116-289 to require the GAO to submit to Congress within one year of the bills enactment a report on the effect that closure of the U.S. Export Finance Agency would have on businesses that utilize the Agencys services.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Horn, Kendra S. amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
